personal.name: Manuj Rai
personal.title: Full-Stack Developer, Software Engineer
personal.summary: Full-stack developer specializing in React, .NET, Python and SQL Server. I build scalable enterprise modules at Fibre2Fashion, focusing on clean architecture, reusable UI components, optimized APIs, stored procedures, and automation. I deliver features with strong attention to detail, maintainability, and performance.

skills.languages: C#, TypeScript, JavaScript, SQL, HTML5, CSS3, Python, React, Node.js
skills.frameworks: ASP.NET MVC, ASP.NET Core, .NET Framework, Angular 14+, Node.js
skills.cloud: Azure App Service, Render, Vercel, Supabase
skills.tools: Git, Azure DevOps, GitHub, Postman, Swagger, IIS, Visual Studio, VS Code, FastAPI, Docker
skills.domains: ERP, SaaS modules, reporting systems, workflow automation, subscription management, AI, ML

job.title: Software Engineer
job.summary: Building and maintaining enterprise-grade modules across TexPro, ERP, and subscription systems using Angular, ASP.NET, and SQL Server.

achievements.item: Developed and optimized complex SQL procedures for TexPro modules.
Refactored controllers, repositories, and models into clean architecture.
Implemented role-based access components using Angular and ASP.NET.
Improved subscription and user-access workflows via DB restructuring.

job.tech_stack: ASP.NET MVC, C#, Angular, Python, FastAPI, MongoDB, SQL Server, Stored Procedures, Azure DevOps, IIS

job.title: Full-Stack Developer
job.summary: Delivered client-based web applications including dashboards, portfolio sites, and API-driven platforms.

achievements.item: Built React dashboards with reusable components and role-based grids.
Delivered .NET backend services for customer portals.
Optimized SEO and performance for portfolio websites.

job.tech_stack: React, Python, FastAPI, SupaBase, Node.js, Vercel, SEO

project.name: AI Knowledge-Based Chatbot
project.description: An intelligent AI chatbot built using NLP and Large Language Models (LLMs), integrated with FAISS-based vector search to deliver accurate, context-aware responses from structured and unstructured data sources.
project.impact: Improved information retrieval accuracy and reduced manual query handling by enabling semantic search-driven conversational responses.
project.tech_stack: Python, NLP, LLMs, FAISS, Vector Database, FastAPI, OpenAI API

project.name: Flying Horses Production
project.description: A professional website developed for a creative production company with a secure portfolio access system using mobile number OTP verification to prevent unauthorized viewing of client work.
project.impact: Protected sensitive portfolio content, improved lead quality, and reduced competitor access through secure OTP-based verification.
project.tech_stack: React, Vite, TypeScript, HTML5, Tailwind CSS, MSG91 OTP Widget

degree.program: Bachelor of Business Administration in Computer Applications (BBA-CA)

highlights.item: Strong foundation in programming and databases.
Built academic projects using .NET, SQL, and Angular.
